segments.text: The scene in this kitchen feels alive, chaotic yet ordinary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar; he’s completely fixated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl’s anticipation makes it all feel like a heist – stealing cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water overflowing from the sink has me feeling uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout for the woman to look down and see the puddle forming below her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast of the tidy garden outside the window feels almost mocking in this moment of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but think how quickly this peaceful image can turn into a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
